Description.val:
FY2011 funding includes $15.507M appropriated for Overseas Contingency Operations supplemental funding. 

FY2012 funding includes $11.500M requested for Overseas Contingency Operations supplemental funding. 

Small Arms encompasses small caliber, hand fired weapons (pistols and rifles) used to support air base ground defense, aircrew protection, Office of Special Investigations, security functions, and other activities requiring small, portable firearms.  This line also procures various accessories needed to improve or maintain existing weapons. 

PEs associated with this P-1 line are 0207227F and 0207580F.

Justification.val:
FY2013 budget request procures items in support of installation and unit mission requirements for Air Force personnel.

Items requested in FY2013 are identified on the following P-40A and are representative of the items to be procured.  Items procured during execution may change based on critical equipment needed to support current Air Force mission requirements.
